```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(janitor)
library(googlesheets4)
```

```{r}
sheets_deauth()
x <- read_sheet("1cgP-e6THVfiW5TJ95QhX3jkNxKvc8Sicp9k_BkSRd2I") %>%
  mutate(prop_red = red / (red + white)) %>%
  drop_na()

x %>%
  ggplot(aes(prop_red)) +
  geom_bar()
```
